n: Mike's BBQ Chili and Honey Lamb Marinade
des: "This marinade is delicious - even my daughter (who hates lamb) loves this dish!  Use on cutlets chops or BBQ whole lamb fillets then slice and add to salad. YUM!"
ins: In a glass bowl, stir together the garlic, mustard, lemon zest, lemon juice, honey, curry powder, chile paste and turmeric. Rub into any cut of lamb, and marinate for at least 3 hours before cooking as desired.
